raw_comment:
I noticed that the leaves arrived later when the location was further away from from the equator. I noticed that the interactive graph had to factor in the weather also because that affects the leaves. 

I wonder why they colors represent each month and if they represent anything in relation to a weather map. 

Leaves living at their lovely pace
ace_sentences: I noticed that the leaves arrived later when the location was further away from the equator.
I noticed that the interactive graph has to factor in the weather.
I wonder why the colors represent each month.
I wonder if the colors represent anything in relation to a weather map.
Leaves live at a lovely pace.
